lead_paragraph: A look at Mr. Trump’s airplanes and helicopters suggests that their value rests chiefly in their marketing potential, with the candidate’s stamp of status masking an aging fleet.
snippet: A look at Mr. Trump’s airplanes and helicopters suggests that their value rests chiefly in their marketing potential, with the candidate’s stamp of status masking an aging fleet....

byline.contributor: Susan C. Beachy contributed research, and David W. Chen and Jeremy B. Merrill contributed reporting.

abstract: Donald J Trump has leveraged publicity generated by his large personal air fleet to add luster to his brand; Trump's use of Boeing 757, plane much larger and more expensive to operate than those used by other presidential candidates, and expansiveness of his fleet, point to his much-articulated penchant for going big.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Aging Air Fleet Gives His Bid, and His Brand, a Lift
headline.print_headline: Trump’s Brand Gets Lift From Aging Air Fleet
